column1: ">Save your login URL to log in to your website next time:"
column2: >Adana adireshin admin don shiga shafin yanar gizonku a nan gaba

column3: iframes allowed only from same origin
column6: >Sauyawa zuwa HTTPS, caching na tsawon kwana 30, yarje wa iframe idan daga asali daya ne kawai, rigakafin gurbatattun nau'ikan mime, manufofin cookie mai turawa da mai nunawa.

column2: >KUNNA (gargadi: na iya karya shafin yanar gizon ku)
>Duban shafi na makonni biyu da suka gabata
